cells.data:
-- toEnum :: a -> Int -> a
on toEnum(e)
    script
        property c : class of e
        on |λ|(x)
            if integer is c or real is c then
                x as number
            else if text is c then
                character id x
            else if boolean is c then
                if 0 ≠ x then
                    true
                else
                    false
                end if
            end if
        end |λ|
    end script
end toEnum
